name: Pyre and Prejudice
information:
prerequisites = None
 NPC: Agricultural Engineer Nitreia Coords: -639, 14, -465
 Celsian Isles Steelmeld
dialogue:
WorkInProgress|Content
 Find fresh hot dirt (Sulfuric Ash) down in the   Link   Scorch Valley Scorch_Valley wikilink and bring it back to the starting
NPC.
 Now, find Bloodmeal Ash in the   Link   Charn Charn wikilink and bring it back to the starting NPC.
 Finally, Collect a fresh Volcanic Ash sample from somewhere in the depths of the   Link   Twilight Aqueduct Twilight_Aqueduct
wikilink and bring it back to the starting NPC.
